mainboard.name: Recross the Paths
mainboard.oracle_text: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a land card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. Clash with an opponent. If you win, return Recross the Paths to its owner's hand. (Each clashing player reveals the top card of their library, then puts that card on the top or bottom. A player wins if their card had a higher mana value.)

mainboard.oracle_text:

Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

mainboard.name: Witherscale Wurm
